import pandas as pd
import os
import numpy as np
import time

from astropy import units as u
from astropy.wcs import WCS
from astropy.coordinates import SkyCoord, Angle  
from astropy.visualization import astropy_mpl_style
from astropy.wcs.utils import proj_plane_pixel_scales


import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.colors as colors

import tensorflow as tf
from tensorflow.keras import datasets, layers, models

from tensorflow import keras
from keras.preprocessing.image import load_img, array_to_img, img_to_array
from keras.models import Model, load_model
from keras.layers import Input, Activation, SeparableConv2D, BatchNormalization, UpSampling2D
from keras.layers.core import Dropout, Lambda
from keras.layers.convolutional import Conv2D, Conv2DTranspose
from keras.layers.pooling import MaxPooling2D, MaxPooling1D
from keras.layers.merge import concatenate
from keras.callbacks import EarlyStopping, ModelCheckpoint

from src.nn_model.models import first_model
from src.read_data.save_data import read_data
from src.data_modifications.algorithms import mean_frec
from src.data_modifications.data_splitting import split_into_small_boxes
from src.galaxy_creation.ellipse_generation import generate_galaxies

from IPython.display import clear_output
from skimage.transform import resize

# Scoring software

from src.scoring.ska_sdc.sdc2 import sdc2_scorer

plt.style.use(astropy_mpl_style)

cmap = plt.cm.winter


[docs]class GalaxyDetector():
    def __init__(self, data_file, number_of_minicubes, overlapping, 
                 function_to_reduce_data, thruth_cat, data_file_ps, min_major_length, 
                 min_minor_length):
        self.data, self.header = read_data(data_file)
       
        # # Point sources
        # self.ps_data, self.ps_header = read_data(data_file_ps)
        # # Spectrum test
        # spectrum_test = [i.iloc[12, 15] for i in self.ps_data]
        # plt.clf()
        # plt.plot(spectrum_test)


        self.cube_number = number_of_minicubes
        
        # Reduce dimensions
        self.reduced_data = function_to_reduce_data(self.data)
        self.length = len(self.reduced_data)
        
        # Read catalogue
        self.thruth_cat = pd.read_csv(thruth_cat, sep=' ', index_col=0)
    
        
        self.overlapping = overlapping

        # Transform coordinates in the catalogue to pixels
        ra = Angle(self.thruth_cat['ra'], unit=u.degree) 
        dec = Angle(self.thruth_cat['dec'], unit=u.degree)
        
        coords = SkyCoord(ra, dec)
        self.wcs = WCS(self.header, naxis=2)
        thruth_pixels = self.wcs.world_to_pixel(coords)
        
        self.thruth_cat['dec'] = thruth_pixels[1]
        self.thruth_cat['ra'] = thruth_pixels[0]
        
        
        # Transform major_semiaxis in the catalogue to pixels. Assumes same pixel scale for both axis
        
        sdss_pixelscale = u.pixel_scale(proj_plane_pixel_scales(self.wcs)[0]*u.degree/u.pixel)
        self.thruth_cat['hi_size'] = [(i * u.arcsec).to(u.pixel, sdss_pixelscale).value for i in self.thruth_cat['hi_size']]
        


        self.thruth_cat['i'] = self.thruth_cat['i'] * np.pi/180
        self.thruth_cat['pa'] = self.thruth_cat['pa'] * np.pi/180
        
        # Split the datacube into small cubes
        
        self.small_datacubes, self.thruth_cat_small = split_into_small_boxes(self.reduced_data, 
                                                                             self.cube_number,
                                                                             self.thruth_cat, 
                                                                             self.overlapping)
        self.length_list_minicubes = len(self.small_datacubes)
        # Generate the ellipses for each datacube

        # min_major_length=0.3, min_minor_length=0.1
        self.all_total_labels = [generate_galaxies(datacube, catalogue, self.length, 
                                                   min_major_length, min_minor_length)
                                 for datacube, catalogue in zip(self.small_datacubes[:], 
                                                                self.thruth_cat_small[:])]
        self.all_ind_labels = []
        
        
            
        self.reduced_data_norm = self.reduced_data/np.max(self.reduced_data)


[docs]    def plot_datacube_label(self, num, real=0):
        plt.figure()
        plt.imshow(self.all_total_labels[num], origin='upper') 
        plt.title('Datacube: {}' .format(real + num))
        plt.colorbar()
        plt.show()

    
            

[docs]    def plot_small_reduced_datacube(self, number_of_datacube=0):
        
        fig = plt.figure()
        fig.add_subplot(111)
        
        # Parameters to set up-left square as the origin
        ra_min = self.small_datacubes[number_of_datacube].columns.values[0]
        dec_min = self.small_datacubes[number_of_datacube].index.values[0]

        plt.imshow(self.small_datacubes[number_of_datacube], cmap=cmap, norm=colors.SymLogNorm(linthresh=7e-6), origin='upper')

        plt.plot(self.thruth_cat_small[number_of_datacube]['ra']- ra_min, self.thruth_cat_small[number_of_datacube]['dec']- dec_min, 'rx')

        plt.colorbar()


        
        

[docs]    def plot_full_reduced_datacube(self):
        fig = plt.figure()
        fig.add_subplot(111) # , projection=self.wcs para ver las coordenadas
       

        plt.imshow(self.reduced_data, cmap=cmap, norm=colors.SymLogNorm(linthresh=1e-5), origin='upper')
        plt.colorbar()
               
        
        plt.plot(self.thruth_cat['ra'], self.thruth_cat['dec'], 'rx')


    def __plot_val_tra_loss(self, model_history):
        loss = model_history.history['loss']
        val_loss = model_history.history['val_loss']
        
        plt.figure()
        plt.plot(model_history.epoch, loss, 'r', label='Training loss')
        plt.plot(model_history.epoch, val_loss, 'bo', label='Validation loss')
        plt.title('Training and Validation Loss')
        plt.xlabel('Epoch')
        plt.ylabel('Loss Value')
        plt.ylim([0, 1])
        plt.legend()
        plt.show()
        


[docs]    def solve_NN(self, fraction_of_training, num, thr, dim, n_filters):
        datac_num = int(fraction_of_training*len(self.small_datacubes))
        
        train_images = np.array([resize(i.to_numpy(), (dim, dim), anti_aliasing=True) for j, i in enumerate(self.small_datacubes) if j <= datac_num])
        train_labels = np.array([np.abs(np.ceil(resize(i.to_numpy(), (dim, dim), anti_aliasing=True)-num)) for j, i in enumerate(self.all_total_labels) if j <= datac_num])

        # REVISAR
        # plt.figure()
        # plt.imshow(train_images[1])
        # plt.figure()
        # plt.imshow(train_labels[1])

        test_images = np.array([resize(i.to_numpy(), (dim, dim), anti_aliasing=True) for j, i in enumerate(self.small_datacubes) if j > datac_num])
        test_labels = np.array([np.abs(np.ceil(resize(i.to_numpy(), (dim, dim), anti_aliasing=True)-num)) for j, i in enumerate(self.all_total_labels) if j > datac_num])
        
        length = len(train_images[0][0])
      
        self.unet = first_model((length, length, 1), n_classes=3, n_filters=n_filters)
        self.unet.summary()
        
        EPOCHS = 30

        self.unet.compile(optimizer='adam', loss='sparse_categorical_crossentropy', metrics=['accuracy'])
        
        earlystopper = EarlyStopping(patience=10, verbose=1)
        model_history = self.unet.fit(train_images, train_labels, batch_size=128, validation_data=(test_images, test_labels), epochs=EPOCHS, callbacks=[earlystopper])
        
        self.__plot_val_tra_loss(model_history)
        

        new_catalogue = []

       # scorer = sdc2_scorer(self.thruth_cat, new_catalogue)
       # result = scorer.run()
       
       

[docs]    def prueba(self, fraction_of_training, num, thr, dim, n_filters, img, real_mask):
        img = np.array([resize(img.to_numpy(), (dim, dim), anti_aliasing=True)])

        real_mask = np.abs(np.round(resize(real_mask.to_numpy(), (dim, dim), anti_aliasing=True)-num))

        self.solve_NN(fraction_of_training, num, thr, dim, n_filters)
                      
        predictions = self.unet.predict(img)
        print(img.shape)
        
        def create_mask(pred_mask):
            pred_mask = tf.math.argmax(pred_mask, axis=-1)
            pred_mask = pred_mask[..., tf.newaxis]
            return pred_mask[0]
        
        def display(display_list):
            plt.figure(figsize=(15, 15))
            
            title = ['Input Image', 'True Mask', 'Predicted Mask']
            
            for i in range(len(display_list)):
                plt.subplot(1, len(display_list), i+1)
                plt.title(title[i])
                if i == 2 and i == 0:
                    plt.imshow(tf.keras.utils.array_to_img(display_list[i], "channels_first", False))
                else:
                    plt.imshow(display_list[i])
                plt.axis('off')
            plt.show()
        new_mask = create_mask(predictions)
        display([img, real_mask, new_mask])


          
        # plt.figure()
   
        # plt.imshow(real_mask)
        # plt.figure()
   
        # mod_pred = predictions[0, :, :, 1]
        # plt.imshow(mod_pred-np.min(mod_pred))
        # plt.colorbar()
        # plt.figure()
        # plt.imshow(img[0, :, :])
#%%        
plt.close('all')

if file_size == 'b':
